function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient emphasis on social and health aspects in building sustainability rating methods","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Reevaluate building sustainability rating methods to include social and health criteria","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, touchless technologies, green spaces","People":"Building industry stakeholders, public health organizations","Owner":"Building industry stakeholders, policymakers"},{"Description":"Deficiencies in existing residential buildings in terms of health and safety risks","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to contagious diseases and compromised safety of residents","Mitigation":"Upgrade building infrastructure to improve health and safety measures","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, viral survivable finishing materials, sustainable technologies","People":"Residents, building owners, public health organizations","Owner":"Building owners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Increased consumption of energy and water in residential houses","Impact":"Greater strain on environmental resources and potential for environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable technologies to reduce energy and water consumption","Technologies":"Sustainable energy and water management systems, remote communication technologies","People":"Residents, environmental organizations","Owner":"Building owners, environmental organizations"}]}
